Question
========

A person achieves a score of 7.2 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 5.5 with a standard deviation 2.4. The z-score of the person with 7.2 good is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -0.65
* 0.71
* 1.29

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-0.65: Incorrect
* 0.71: Correct
* 1.29: Incorrect
